Steps to reproduce
------------------
Note: None of the built-in commands utilize these sections (reference: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/7114)

```powershell
PS C:\> Install-Module -Name 'Armor'
PS C:\> Import-Module -Name 'Armor'
PS C:\> ( Get-Help -Name 'Connect-Armor' -Detailed | Out-String -Stream ) -match 'COMPONENT|FUNCTIONALITY'
PS C:\> Get-Help -Name Connect-Armor | Select-Object -Property Component, Functionality

Component Functionality
--------- -------------
Armor API Armor session management
```

Expected behavior
-----------------
`Get-Help -Full` & `Get-Help -Detailed` should output the Component, Role, or Functionality sections if populated

Actual behavior
---------------
`Get-Help -Full` & `Get-Help -Detailed` does not output the Component, Role, or Functionality sections if populated

title: Get-Help -Full / -Detailed does not output the Component, Role, or Functionality sections, even if populated
